/.title: Home
/.get_started_hint: To get started, add a new

/wallets.title: Wallets
/wallets.introduction: Connect a new wallet to sync your Bitcoin data. Adding a Lightning wallet connection will allow you to remote control your node with Clams.

delete_wallet_modal.heading: Delete Wallet
delete_wallet_modal.paragraph: Are you sure that you would like to delete this wallet connection and all of its associated data?

/wallets/add.title: Add Wallet
/wallets/add.introduction: Select a wallet you would like to connect from the following:

/welcome.title: Welcome
/welcome.subheading: Welcome to Clams Remote. To get started, we need a secure passphrase to encrypt your session. We suggest generating and saving a strong passphrase with a password manager.

/decrypt.title: Decrypt
/decrypt.subheading: Welcome back! To decrypt your Remote session, please enter your passphrase.

labels.add_wallet: You do not have a wallet connected.
labels.no_channels: You have no channels, try syncing your wallets or open a new channel.
labels.no_channels_filtered: No channels match your current filters
labels.no_offers: You have no offers, try syncing your wallets or create a new offer.
labels.no_offers_filtered: No offers match your current filters
labels.no_payments: No payments here, try adding a wallet connection and syncing it.
labels.no_payments_filtered: No payments match your current filters.
labels.no_utxos: No utxos here, try adding a wallet connection and syncing it.
labels.no_utxos_filtered: No utxos match your current filters.
labels.no_forwards: No forwards here, ensure that you have a lightning wallet connected and you have more than one open channel.
labels.no_forwards_filtered: No forwards match your current filters.
labels.no_wallets: No wallets here, add a wallet to get started.
labels.no_wallets_filtered: No wallets match your current filters.
labels.offer_type_value: {{offerType; bolt12 offer:Pay; bolt12 invoice:Pay; bolt12 invoice_request:Withdraw;}}
labels.label: Label
labels.language_description: Set your preferred language for the app.
labels.reset_description: Completely wipe the app and start fresh.
labels.fiat_description: Set your default fiat currency for all amount comparisons.
labels.homescreen_description: Set which tiles will be displayed on your homescreen.
labels.summary_channel_force_close_pending: is force closing a channel with
labels.summary_channel_force_close_waiting: is force closing a channel with
labels.summary_sweep_pending: is sweeping timelocked sats from force close with
labels.summary_sweep_waiting: is sweeping timelocked sats from force close with
labels.summary_sweep_complete: swept timelocked sats from force close with
labels.summary_htlc_waiting: is resolving a htlc from channel close with
labels.summary_htlc_pending: is resolving a htlc from channel close with
labels.summary_htlc_complete: resolved a htlc from channel close with
labels.payment_status: {{direction; receive:{{status; pending:Pending Invoice; expired:Expired Invoice; complete:Received}}; send:{{status; pending:Sending; complete:Sent; failed:Failed;}};}}
labels.pay_offer_description: Enables repeated payments to the same QR
labels.withdraw_offer_description: Enables a one time withdraw from your node.
labels.lava_lamp_description: Turn the laval lamp animation on and off
labels.invoice_description_placeholder: Description to include in payment request
labels.disable_offer_description: Are you sure you want to permanently disable this offer?
labels.reset_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all your data and completely reset the app?

messages.closing_channel: Closing a channel will publish an onchain transaction and settle the current channel balances.
messages.initiate_force_close: Force closing will immediately close the channel and should only be initiated when your channel partner is unresponsive. Force closing will result in higher onchain fees and your funds will be timelocked (not spendable) for some time.
messages.channel_close_in_progress: This channel is closing and is waiting for the closing transaction to be included in a block.
messages.waiting_for_channel_response: This channel is closing and is waiting for a response from the channel partner.

errors.connection_unknown: Oh dear, something went wrong, please try again or contact support.
errors.connection_pay_route_not_found: Could not find a route for payment.
errors.connection_pay_route_too_expensive: Found a route, but the fees were too high based on max allowable fees.
errors.connection_cannot_afford: Not enough funds available to make this transaction.
errors.connection_fund_broadcast_fail: Failed to broadcast channel funding transaction.
errors.connection_fund_peer_not_connected: Peer is not connected when trying to open channel.
errors.connection_fund_unknown: Could not make onchain transaction (send or open channel).
errors.connection_invoice_not_found: Could not find invoice to delete.
errors.connection_offer_no_route: Could not find an onion route to node making offer.
errors.connection_offer_returned_error: The node making the offer returned an error.
errors.connection_offer_timeout: Timed out waiting for a response from the node making the offer.
errors.connection_transactions_get: Could not get transactions to check for inclusion in a block.
errors.connection_configuration: There is a problem with the connection configuration.
errors.connection_permissions: Could not make request due to a permissions or rate limit error.
errors.connection_not_supported: Could not make request due to feature not being supported on this connection.
errors.connection_self_payment_not_supported: Self payments are not supported by this connection.
errors.connection_unsupported_action: This action is not supported on this connection, please select another connection to continue.
errors.connection_derive_output_address: Could not derive an address for an output of an onchain transaction.
errors.connection_cannot_receive_payment: The selected wallet connection cannot receive a payment, try selecting another one.
errors.connection_not_available: The selected wallet is not available and connected.
errors.invalid_passphrase: The provided passphrase is incorrect and could not decrypt the session.
errors.camera_browser_support: Connection to your device's camera is not supported on this browser.
errors.camera_permissions: Permission to connect to your camera was rejected, if you meant to approve access to the camera, simply refresh the page and try again.
errors.onchain_unsupported: Onchain payments are not yet supported
errors.permissions_clipboard: The request to read your clipboard was rejected. Please adjust your browser preferences if you would like to enable clipboard read access.
errors.permissions_notifications: The request to enable notifications was rejected. Please adjust your browser or system preferences if you would like to enable notifications.
errors.min_sendable: Amount is less than payment request minimum
errors.max_sendable: Amount is larger than payment request maximum
errors.min_withdrawable: Amount is less than withdraw minimum
errors.max_withdrawable: Amount is larger than withdraw maximum
errors.lnurl_metadata_hash: Description hash in payment request does not match the hash of LNURL metadata.
errors.lnurl_pay_amount: Amount in payment request does not match the amount requested.
errors.lnurl_pay_error: There was a problem paying LNURL
errors.lnurl_unsupported_tag: This LNURL type: {{tag}} is currently unsupported.
errors.recurrence_unsupported: Recurring Bolt12 offers are not currently supported.
errors.lnurl_auth: There was an error trying to log you in.
errors.wallet_transaction_send_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can send an onchain transaction.
errors.wallet_keysend_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can send a keysend transaction to a node public key.
errors.wallet_pay_invoice_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can pay a BOLT11 invoice.
errors.wallet_offers_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can pay a BOLT12 offer.
errors.wallet_receive_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can receive to a BOLT11 invoice or an onchain address.
errors.wallet_create_offer_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can create an offer.
errors.wallet_channel_open_unavailable: You do not have any wallets connected that can open an channel.
errors.fetched_invoice_invalid: An invalid invoice was returned when trying to pay offer.
errors.fetched_invoice_amount_invalid: The invoice returned has a different amount than what was requested from the offer.
